page.title: 04 THE MALTINGS (continued)
page.content: Lunchtimes at the Maltings is busy and popular with all age groups. Snacks and drinks are available from Monday to Saturday. Rooms may be booked for special occasions such as weddings, evening dinners etc. Although the Maltings is now buzzing with activity, much remains to be done. 40 per cent of the building remains unconverted.A Development Trust was launched in 1984 with the task of raising Â£600 000 over five years to convert the final stage. This will include a conference centre,craft workshops, a video and film workshop and additional bar and catering facilities. The Maltings has come a long way in the last fifteen years and the community of Farnham have a centre of which they can justly be proud.
